alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 1:33AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Van Buren and western Cleburne Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 132 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Woolum, or 9 miles west of Clinton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Shirley... Higden... Fairfield Bay Marina... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Choctaw... Alread... Edgemont... Morganton... Hill Creek Recreation Area... Rupert... Scotland... Culpepper... Eden Isle... South Fork Recreation Area... Narrows Marina... Crabtree... Brewer... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
